channel.title: Nutanix on vNinja.net
channel.description: Recent content in Nutanix on vNinja.net

item.title: Goodbye PernixData FVP and Architect
item.description: As we all know by now, PernixData was gobbled up by Nutanix a while back, and since then there has been a nothing but silence on the future of the FVP and Architect products. Now it seems it’s over. The acquisition trigged a bunch of PernixData employees moving elsewhere, and now it’s the products time to move on as well.
